definition: Monthly Active Users calculated as sum of users who have use_case_mtd greater than 0, indicating users who performed at least one UPI transaction use case in the current month
Total count of users in the system, representing the sum of all users across different lifecycle stages and account profiles.
Percentage distribution calculated as (MAU for each handle group / Total MAU within lifecycle partition) * 100, showing the proportion of monthly active users across different handle counts
business_alias: Retention Rate, Percentage Distribution, MAU Distribution Percentage

definition: Count of distinct UPI accounts/handles per user, representing the number of active UPI accounts a user maintains
User lifecycle categorization in the current month, including stages like Active, Dormant, and other user states based on transaction activity.
business_alias: User Lifecycle, Customer Lifecycle, Lifecycle Current Month

definition: Month-to-date use case activity indicator showing whether a user has performed UPI transactions in distinct use cases during the current month
business_alias: Use Cases Month-to-Date, Monthly Use Case Activity

definition: Count of distinct bank accounts associated with users, representing the number of linked payment accounts.
User lifecycle status indicating inactive users who have not performed transactions within the specified period.
Last Month To Date Monthly Active Users - sum of users filtered for the LMTD period, representing active users from the same day range in the previous month
Month To Date Monthly Active Users - sum of users filtered for the MTD period, representing active users from the beginning of current month to current date
Last Month To Date - time period representing the same day range in the previous month as the current MTD period
business_alias: Last Month Till Date, Last Month To Date

definition: Month To Date time period, representing data from the beginning of the current month to the current date
business_alias: Month To Date, Month to Date

definition: Unified Payments Interface - India's instant real-time payment system that facilitates inter-bank transactions through mobile platforms
Different categories or types of UPI transactions and payment flows that users engage with
User classification categories including new users ('a:new') and reactivated users ('c:react') based on their UPI usage patterns
business_alias: User Lifecycle Stage, Lifecycle CM, Customer Lifecycle, Customer Lifecycle Stage, User_type, User Type, User Profile

definition: Daily Active Users - the number of unique users who perform at least one UPI transaction on a given day
Total number of UPI transactions including PAY and COLLECT transaction types with SUCCESS or DEEMED status
Transactions Per User - calculated as total transactions divided by Daily Active Users (sum(txns)/sum(DAU))
Top 20 cities in India including New Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Mumbai, Chennai, Noida, Gurgaon, and others where UPI transactions are analyzed
The percentage of users who continue to use UPI services in subsequent months, calculated as users divided by the maximum users in the same lifecycle and base month partition
business_alias: Retention Rate, NRR_retention, User Retention Analysis, User Retention Rate

definition: Segmentation approach that groups users based on their behavioral patterns, lifecycle stages, or user types
Customer reactive segment that includes users with reaction patterns categorized as 'c:react 1-3' and 'c:react 3+' user types
business_alias: reactive users, Customer Reactive, Reactivated Customers

definition: The starting month used as reference point for calculating retention cohorts and measuring user activity progression
User classification system that categorizes users based on their engagement patterns and behavioral stages
The initial month when a user first becomes active, used as reference point for retention calculations
Users classified as 'a:new' in their lifecycle stage, representing first-time UPI users in a given period
The difference in months between the base month and retention month, used to measure retention periods
Count of distinct customers (scope_cust_id) within a specific lifecycle and time period
Total count of successful UPI transactions, including transactions with 'success' and 'deemed' status
Total count of all UPI transactions across all statuses (success, deemed, failure, pending)
Success Rate calculated as the ratio of successful transactions (success + deemed status) to total overall transactions (success + deemed + failure + pending status)
Classification of UPI transaction flows based on transaction categories like VPA2MERCHANT, VPA2VPA, VPA2ACCOUNT
UPI transactions from Virtual Payment Address to merchant accounts
UPI transactions between Virtual Payment Addresses (peer-to-peer transfers)
UPI transactions from Virtual Payment Address to bank account
The starting month used as a reference point for calculating retention and user lifecycle analysis
The difference in months between the base month and retention month, calculated using date_diff function
User lifecycle category representing repeat users who have made multiple UPI transactions
Unique customer identifier used to track individual users across different time periods for retention analysis
The subsequent month being compared to the base month for retention analysis
Month-over-month growth percentage calculated as sum of month-over-month growth divided by sum of users (SUM(mom_growth)/SUM(users))
Current month or month zero in retention analysis, indicating users in their base month of activity
Net Retention Rate - calculated as current month users divided by the maximum users in the same lifecycle and base month cohort
Total count of distinct users who were active in the last month period
Count of users who were active in both the base period and the subsequent retention period
Count of distinct users from the previous month across different lifecycle stages who form the baseline for retention calculation
Count of distinct users who were active in the previous month and also performed transactions in the current month-to-date period
Monthly Active Users - the count of unique users who were active within a specific month period
Count of users from the base period who continued to be active in the current period, used to measure user retention.
Percentage of users retained from previous period, calculated as (Retained users Ã— 100) / Total users
Real Money Gaming - category referring to gaming merchants and related user engagement metrics
Day over Day analysis comparing metrics between consecutive days to identify trends
Count of transactions with status 'success' or 'deemed' indicating completed successful payments
Total count of all transactions including success, deemed, failure, and pending status transactions
Binary classification indicating whether a user is involved in gaming transactions ('Gaming') or not ('Non_gaming')
Count of distinct transaction categories (P2P, SnP, Online, Onus) that a user has engaged in during the month
Person-to-Person transactions - UPI payments made between individual users (VPA2VPA category).
Scan and Pay transactions including 3P QR and Paytm QR payments
Online UPI transactions including Intent, P2M Collect, and Mandate_Online flows
On-us transactions including Onus_ExcMandates and Mandate_Onus flows within the same bank
Count of users who viewed the banner for various UPI features
Total aggregated count of all users who viewed banners across all UPI features
Count of users who completed the target action after viewing the banner
Count of users who clicked on the banner for UPI features
Count of users who completed the target action after clicking the banner
Target Group and Control Group tracking methodology for measuring banner effectiveness
UPI feature allowing users to link their bank accounts for payments
UPI feature for linking RuPay credit cards to UPI payments
Feature activation for UPI Lite small value payment service
Feature allowing users to download their UPI transaction statements
Widget feature for receiving money through UPI interface
Widget feature for scanning QR codes and making UPI payments
Feature providing users with analytics and insights on their spending patterns
Feature for automatically topping up UPI Lite balance when it falls below threshold
Total count of users in the base period used for retention analysis, typically representing users active in the previous month.
Gross Merchandise Value - the total transaction amount/value processed through UPI payments.
business_alias: Gross Merchandise Value, Amount, Gross Merchandise Value

definition: Grouping dimension used for segmenting UPI retention analysis, likely referring to GMV Per User or similar user profiling metric.
Total count of UPI transactions including PAY and COLLECT transaction types with SUCCESS or DEEMED status
Person-to-Merchant transactions - UPI payments made from individuals to merchants (VPA2MERCHANT category).
Ratio comparing P2P Daily Active Users to P2M Daily Active Users, calculated using LAG function to compare previous period DAU values.
Ratio comparing P2P transaction count to P2M transaction count, calculated using LAG function to compare previous period transaction values.
Ratio comparing P2P transaction amounts to P2M transaction amounts, calculated using LAG function to compare previous period GMV values.
Total monetary value of all UPI transactions in the specified currency
Geographic dimension representing the state where UPI users are located, used for regional analysis
Calculated field that categorizes transactions as either P2P or P2M based on is_p2p and is_p2m boolean flags
Classification of UPI transaction types including VPA2MERCHANT, VPA2VPA, and VPA2ACCOUNT
